conflictDescription: User Story A requires only formal voice commands, rejecting informal language, while User Story B requires ALFRED to communicate in a natural and informal tone. These two goals cannot be met at the same time.

userStoryASummary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to enforce formal voice commands to keep interactions clear and professional.
userStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to talk in a natural and informal way like I do with my family and friends, so I feel comfortable and engaged.
resolutionDescription: Both user stories are updated to allow ALFRED to accept both formal and informal voice commands and to adjust its communication style based on user preference or context, enabling flexible interaction modes.
newUserStoryASummary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to support clear voice commands that can be formal or informal, so that interactions remain understandable and effective.
